i am a childrens librarian.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.

i am a closet cannibal.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy my morning tea with gluten free toast and homemade jam.
I go for walks with my dog to stay fit and healthy while spending quality time with a family member.
i have a cat named leela.
I like to wear comfortable clothes to work.
I'm trying to get myself into a regular exercise routine, but it's hard to find the time.

content.text: Just enjoying my morning tea with some homemade jam.
Sounds delicious! What kind of tea are you drinking?
It's a chai tea blend I found at the farmer's market.
Sounds interesting! I've never had chai tea before.
You should definitely try it! It's really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a librarian at the local children's library.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job! I love reading.
It is! I get to read all day long and help kids find books they love.
That's awesome! I wish I could read all day long.
Me too! But I have to get my exercise in, too.
I hear you. I'm trying to get into a regular exercise routine, but it's hard to find the time.
I know what you mean. I try to go for walks with my dog every day, but that's about it.
That's a good start! I should try that.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and spend time with your pet.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely give it a try.
